thread.title: 15 Cards For People Who Don't Give A Damn About Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: 15 Cards For People Who Don't Give A Damn About Valentine's Day

author: Brittany Wong
title: 15 Cards For People Who Don't Give A Damn About Valentine's Day
text:
15 Cards For People Who Don't Give A Damn About Valentine's Day "Cupid rhymes with stupid." 02/08/2017 06:56 pm ET Brittany Wong Relationships Editor, The Huffington Post 
Valentine’s Day is for lovers ― but who says singles can’t have a little fun with it, too? 
Below, 15 anti -valentines to send to your favorite love hater come February 14. 1 For The Pizza Fiend Etsy 2 For The Cynical Chocolate Lover Etsy 3 For The Meme Queen Etsy 4 For The Foul-Mouthed Friend Etsy 5 For The Busy Bee Etsy 6 For The Excuse Maker Etsy 7 For The Tequila Enthusiast Etsy 8 For The Cat Lady Etsy
